body: Do you know more things to pvp better that arent just blockhit / jumping for critics? Please tell me
body_tagged: Do you know more things to pvp better that arent just blockhit / jumping for critics? Please tell me
title: Do you know....?

replies.body: Sneak to cancel most part of knockback when someone hits you ?
replies.body_tagged: Sneak to cancel most part of knockback when someone hits you ?

replies.body:
Just remember our lord and savior, Shrek. He will aid you through your troubles.
Just practice, practice,practice and practice and you will get better.
And if you're having fps problems get that fixed and it will be all ogre.
replies.body_tagged:
Just remember our lord and savior, Shrek. He will aid you through your troubles.
Just practice, practice,practice and practice and you will get better.
And if you're having fps problems get that fixed and it will be all ogre.

replies.body: Strafing works pretty well. To strafe just circle around your opponent while hitting and mess up their aim so they can't hit you.
replies.body_tagged: Strafing works pretty well. To strafe just circle around your opponent while hitting and mess up their aim so they can't hit you.

replies.body: No Bones about it at all
replies.body_tagged: No Bones about it at all
